text: Oceania Para Table Tennis Championships is a biennial sports event for para table tennis players who represent an Oceanian country. It debuted in 2011 after Asia and Oceania Para Table Tennis Championships separated. ==Locations== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Edition !! Year !! Host !! Dates !! Competitors !! Countries !! Top medalists !! title: Oceania Para Table Tennis Championships
